Author: taxigermy
Text: That is the worst!! Reading your comment I had to skip over the foods because they were making me feel the same way!

Author: caalelle
Text: oh my god my grandma is really southern and tries to force feed me and guilt trips me to make me eat. she gets mad and tries to make me eat meat and break my vegetarianism. I'm gagging just thinking about it. she starts yelling a list of food she's like "BACON. TOAST?! SAUSAGE!! grilled cheese. tacos. TACOS? FRIED CHICKEN. LET ME TAKE YOU TO KFC. DRINK SOME CHOCOLATE MILK YOU NEED CALCIUM. ramen noodles. tuna salad? salad."  the whole time I'm like "No. No. No thank you. No. I don't eat meat. Dairy makes me sick. No thanks. Yeah! I'll eat a salad : ) NO DRESSING!! I DONT WANT RANCH."
